articles.content:

articles.title: Salvini Slams Coronavirus Control Methods as Cases Confirmed in Lombardy and Veneto
articles.description: Populist Italian Senator Matteo Salvini slammed the leftist government's handling of the coronavirus as 14 new cases were confirmed in Lombardy and two more in Veneto.
articles.content:
Populist Italian Senator Matteo Salvini slammed the leftist government’s handling of the coronavirus as 14 new cases were confirmed in Lombardy and two more in Veneto.

articles.title: Israeli Businesses Appeal for Government 'Safety Net' over Coronavirus Impact
articles.description: Israeli businesses want the government to set up a "financial safety net" for enterprises impacted by the coronavirus outbreak.
articles.content:
In an appeal to the Finance Ministry, the Manufacturers Association of Israel said businesses are suffering from a lack of raw materials, continued delays in receiving supplies, and an overall decrease in production from overseas primarily China.

articles.author: Breitbart London
articles.title: Dozens of Italian Towns on 'Effective Lockdown' as Coronavirus Hits
articles.description: ROME (AP) - A dozen towns in northern Italy were on effective lockdown Saturday after the new virus linked to China claimed a first fatality in Italy and sickened an increasing number of people who had no direct links to the origin of the virus.
